pr_title: Ensure that QuarkusClassLoader returns the same URL format as URLClassLoader

timeline.bodyText: Does Windows generate the URI with backslashes? Even though \ is the file seperator / is the URI seperator, so I can't remember which one it produces?
timeline.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText: I was hoping CI would tell, but it failed for a different reason. Just looking around on the internet it seems that for Windows it continues to use /, so I'll update this and see what happens
replies.author: geoand

timeline.message:
Ensure that QuarkusClassLoader returns the same URL format as URLClassLoader

The URLClassLoader adds a trailing slash when resolving a directory so we
should do the same to prevent the QuarkusClassLoader from returning
multiple entries for the same directory.

This should properly fix the Flyway issue
